javadoc: PCodeTestGroupControlBlock corresponds to each test group contained within a binary test file and identified by the GROUP_CONTROL_BLOCK_MAGIC 64-bit character field value at the start of the data structure.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Construct test group control block instance for the specified
 program.  Create GroupInfo structure data within program if requested.

params.name: applyStruct
params.comment: create GroupInfo structure data within program if true

name: PCodeTestGroupControlBlock
comment:
PCodeTestGroupControlBlock corresponds to each test group contained within 
 a binary test file and identified by the GROUP_CONTROL_BLOCK_MAGIC 64-bit character 
 field value at the start of the data structure.
